resources.string: Audio and background conversations are never sent to Google without your consent
Your device will check for sounds you want to be notified about, like when a smoke alarm beeps or baby cries

When using Live Transcribe, you can:
  1.  Type responses to the transcription you see on screen
  2.  Get alerts when your name is spoken
  3.  Search within transcriptions

Google processes your conversations, but never stores them
Live Transcribe shows speech as text on your screen so you can participate in conversations around you more easily
